      public CrossThreadMethodInvoker start(int numberOfBackgroundThreads)

    • stop

      public CrossThreadMethodInvoker stop()

    • waitForBackgroundThreads

      public boolean waitForBackgroundThreads()
      Executes the queued method invocations in the current thread until N background threads signal via backgroundThreadDone() that they are finished or the getTimeout() is reached. N = numberOfBackgroundThreads provided to the start(int) method.
      Returns:
      true if all background threads finished within time, false if a timeout occurred
